title: Random Number Generation
description: This function generates a random number based on a given input 'X' and a precision defined by 'N'. If 'X' is zero, the function returns zero. Otherwise, it scales 'X' by a calculated factor 'M' to produce a more refined output.
name: RND

input.name: X
input.description: The input value for which a random number is to be generated.

input.name: N
input.description: The precision level that determines how finely the random number is generated.

output.name: RND
output.description: The randomly generated number based on input 'X' and precision 'N'.

return_value.description: The result of the random number generation, which can be zero or a scaled version of 'X'.
